name: From One Case to Another
desc: Aid Taruka in the Scorchwind Trial Grounds, to investigate the suspicious Lamizana.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
Indwell in a Qucusaur or use a character of the Feather-Flower Tribe to pass through the Recon Ring above the <color=#ece5d8>Scorchwind Trial Grounds</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Starting Location</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Scorchwind Trial Grounds, Natlan</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>
World Quest Series:

customize.name: From One Case to Another
customize.desc: Aid Taruka in the Scorchwind Trial Grounds, to investigate the suspicious Lamizana.

customize.name: Incidents Are Ever Sudden
customize.desc: At Pakpaka Flying School, what seemed like just another routine challenge mission at first...

customize.name: Beat the Clock: 24 Hours
customize.desc: The plot thickens...

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.name: Little One
customize.desc: A little Tepetlisaurus that received theBlessing. It accompanied the Traveler on a pilgrimage to the Great Volcano of Tollan to remove the mark.

customize.name: Iktomisaurus
customize.desc:
Able to use their plumage for leaping, Iktomisaurs are also the only type of Saurian to have grasped how to enter the "Spiritspeaker" state.
According to legend, their ancestors did not have a physical form, and instead could drift like spirits between reality and the spiritual realm, manifesting themselves through the darkness of night. Some also say that the first Iktomisaur to emerge from the Night Kingdom was not actually a true Saurian, but rather a unique race distinct from ordinary Saurians.
